title: Quinoline yellow
description: Quinoline Yellow WS is a mixture of organic compounds derived from the dye Quinoline Yellow SS -Spirit Soluble-.  Owing to the presence of sulfonate groups, the WS dyes are water-soluble -WS-.  It is a mixture of disulfonates -principally-, monosulfonates and trisulfonates of 2--2-quinolyl-indan-1â€š3-dione with a maximum absorption wavelength of 416 nm.p. 119
